description:
After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi’s ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les sbires d`Orochi. Zoro face aux ninjas !
Orochi no Otte! Ninja Gundan vs Zoro
Orochi`s Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!
Orochis Verfolger! Die Ninjaeinheit vs. Zorro
Охота Орочи! Отряд ниндзя против Зоро!
オロチの追手! 忍者軍団VSゾロ
